description: '''Amaia Romero Arbizu''' (born 3 January 1999), known mononymously as '''Amaia''', is a Spanish singer-songwriter, pianist and actress. After participating in many talent shows, she gained national recognition after winning [[Operación Triunfo (series 9)|series nine]] of musical television contest ''[[Operación Triunfo (Spanish TV series)|Operación Triunfo]]'', later representing [[Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest|Spain]] alongside fellow competitor [[Alfred García]] at the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2018|2018 Eurovision Song Contest]] with "[[Tu canción|Tu Canción]]". Romero later signed with [[Universal Music Group|Universal Music]] and released her debut album ''[[Pero No Pasa Nada]]'' in 2019.
